case_title: MUHAMMAD IBRAHIM AND 3 OTHERS vs Moulvi ABDUL REHMAN AND 2 OTHERS
complaint_summary: The appellants challenged the rejection of their appeal regarding the purchase of surrendered land under M.L.R. 89, citing the minor status of the respondents' sons and their non-tenant status.
investigation_summary: The Revenue Commissioner examined the case and determined that the respondents were covered under the definition of 'sitting tenants' as per the Sind Tenancy Act, 1950 and West Pakistan Land Revenue Act, 1967.

judgment_summary.impugned_order_details: Order by Revenue Commissioner, Sind, rejecting appeal regarding purchase of land in Deh Bothero, Taluka Sinjhoro.

main_contentions.petitioners: Two sons of respondent were minors at the time of land disposal and were not sitting tenants.
main_contentions.respondents: Covered by definition of 'sitting tenants' under Sind Tenancy Act, 1950 and West Pakistan Land Revenue Act, 1967.

judgment_summary.court_findings: No bar on minors being tenants; respondents entitled to purchase surrendered land under M.L.R. 89 scheme. Petitioners failed to rebut findings of impugned order.

legal_arguments: Definition of 'Tenant' under Sind Tenancy Act, 1950 and West Pakistan Land Revenue Act, 1967.
Entitlement of 'sitting tenants' to purchase surrendered land under M.L.R. 89.
assets: Surrendered land (B. Nos. 11/1 to 4 and others of Deh Bothero, Taluka Sinjhoro)
key_issues: Definition of 'sitting tenants' under tenancy laws.
Entitlement to purchase surrendered land under M.L.R. 89.

legal_terms.Tenant: A person who occupies land or property rented from a landlord.
legal_terms.Sitting Tenant: A tenant who is currently occupying the property.

words_and_phrases.Surrendered Land: Land relinquished by its previous owner under a legal scheme.

summary_vector_notes: The case revolves around the rejection of a revision petition challenging the entitlement of respondents to purchase surrendered land under M.L.R. 89. The court upheld the Revenue Commissioner's findings, emphasizing the legal definition of 'tenant' and 'sitting tenant' under relevant statutes.
